ğŸ“¢ Take Website specific notes in side panel with live preview markdown and local disk realtime sync.

ğŸ“Œ Why you should consider this:
âœª Live preview markdown editor
âœª Website specific (Domain-wise) sticky notes
âœª No signup required
âœª Fuzzy search
âœª Persistent Text Highlighter
âœª Take screenshot and insert into notes
âœª Dark mode and custom themes.
âœª Sync with desktop local file manager.
âœª Sync with cloud drive: GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox,box,notion.
âœª Pure & clean code that powers fastest performance.
âœª Cloud & Cross-devices realtime sync .
âœª Export notes in three format: markdown,html and pdf
âœª All notes and media-files saved locally. Never touch our server
âœª No tracking & no Ads.
âœª Lightweight 80KB only
âœª No third-party library used.
âœª Negligible memory consumption (consume 400% less memory than new tab).

âŒ¨ï¸ keyboard shortcuts
Alt + W â‡’ Open domainNote sidePanel
Alt + S â‡’ Capture Screenshot
Ctrl + Shift + S  â‡’ Save edited note
Ctrl + Z â‡’ undo (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+Y â‡’ redo (work only when copy listener on)
Alt + H â‡’ highlight (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl + Shift + H â‡’ remove highlight (work only when copy listener on)
Shift + Space â‡’ extend selection (work only when copy listener on)

ğŸ“Œ == FEATURES ==
âœ… Markdown live preview editor
You don't need to open separate panel to preview your markdown.
domainNote provides a real live preview like WYSIWYG editor.
you can update existing markdown's mark to change formatted text.

âœ… Create Website specific sticky notes
you can group multiple domains

âœ… Remind todo you when you visit website(coming soon)

âœ… Persistent text highlighter
Highlight text by right click menu or (Alt + H when copy listener on).
Fastest highlighter in chrome web store.
domainNote highlight text without creating new DOM element.
Read more: https://web.dev/dom-size-and-interactivity/

âœ… Custom Themes & fonts
customize each-note appearance according to its purposes

âœ… Time has come to forget ctrl+c and ctrl+v
Drag and drop any web content e.g images,selected text.
domainNote doesn't convert text into image like others do.
domainNote format into markdown so that you can easily modify them
selected text will auto-copied to  domainNote when you press ctrl+c on any webpage
keyboard shortcuts (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+Z â‡’ undo
Ctrl+Y â‡’ redo
Alt+H â‡’ highlight
Ctrl + Shift + H â‡’ remove highlight
Ctrl+ Shift +Z â‡’ undo highlight
Ctrl+ Shift +Y â‡’ redo highlight
Shift + Space â‡’ extend selection

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Take screenshot
Click on screenshot icon for capture and save screenshot
Use Keyboard shortcut (Alt + S)

ğŸ–ï¸ Highlight text
When you clip selected text, selected text will highlighted automatically
Click on Save Highlight button on right bottom corner to save highlight.
For remove highlight, Select again highlighted text and press Ctrl + Shift + H.
For disable highlight, Go to options page

âœ… No vendor locked in.
domainNote realtime sync your notes with desktop local file manager in three format:
markdown,html & pdf
You can view and edit notes in any other markdown based note editor.

âœ… Realtime sync notes with other cloud providers 
You can sync notes with cloud drive providers:GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox,box. You can sync notes with cloud notes providers:Notion, onenote (coming soon).

âœ… Private and secure 
All data saved locally. Your notes or media file e.g images, videos never touch our server.

â„¹ï¸ Support 
Join domainNote on google groups: 
https://groups.google.com/g/domainnote

You can mail us: noderailhelp@gmail.com

ğŸ“¢ Prendi appunti specifici per il sito web nel pannello laterale con markdown in anteprima dal vivo e sincronizzazione del disco locale.

ğŸ“Œ PerchÃ© dovresti considerare questo:
âœª ribasso dell'anteprima dal vivo
âœª Note specifiche del sito Web (a livello di dominio).
âœª Nessuna registrazione richiesta
âœª Ricerca fuzzy
âœª Evidenziatore di testo (Ã¨ necessario abilitarlo)
âœª Cattura screenshot e inseriscilo nelle note
âœª ModalitÃ  oscura e temi personalizzati.
âœª Sincronizzazione con il file manager locale del desktop.
âœª Esporta note in tre formati: markdown, html e pdf
âœª Sincronizzazione con unitÃ  cloud: GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox,box,notion.
âœª Codice puro e pulito che garantisce prestazioni piÃ¹ veloci.
âœª Sincronizzazione cloud e tra dispositivi (disponibile a breve).
âœª Tutte le note e i file multimediali salvati localmente
âœª Nessun tracciamento.
âœª Nessuna libreria di terze parti utilizzata.
âœª Consumo di memoria trascurabile (consuma il 400% di memoria in meno rispetto alla nuova scheda).

âŒ¨ï¸ scorciatoie da tastiera
tasti rapidi
Alt + W â‡’ Apri il pannello laterale di domainNote
Alt + S â‡’ Cattura schermata
Ctrl + Maiusc + S â‡’ Salva la nota modificata
Ctrl+Z â‡’ annulla (funziona solo quando Ã¨ attiva la copia del listener)
Ctrl+Y â‡’ ripeti (funziona solo quando la copia listener Ã¨ attiva)
Alt + H â‡’ evidenzia (funziona solo quando la copia ascoltatore Ã¨ attiva)
Ctrl+Maiusc+H â‡’ rimuovi evidenziazione (funziona solo quando la copia listener Ã¨ attiva)
Maiusc + Spazio â‡’ estendi la selezione (funziona solo quando la copia ascoltatore Ã¨ attiva)

ğŸ“Œ == CARATTERISTICHE ==
âœ… Anteprima dal vivo del markdown
Non Ã¨ necessario aprire un pannello separato per visualizzare in anteprima il ribasso.
domainNote fornisce un'anteprima dal vivo reale come l'editor wysiwyg.
puoi aggiornare il segno di ribasso esistente per modificare il testo formattato.

âœ… Crea note specifiche per il sito web
puoi raggruppare piÃ¹ domini

âœ… Ricordarti di cosa fare quando visiti il â€‹â€‹sito web (disponibile a breve)

âœ… Evidenzia il testo
Evidenzia il testo facendo clic con il pulsante destro del mouse.
Evidenziatore piÃ¹ veloce nel Chrome Web Store.
domainNote evidenzia il testo senza creare un nuovo elemento DOM.
Per saperne di piÃ¹: https://web.dev/dom-size-and-interactivity/

NOTA: l'evidenziatore Ã¨ disabilitato per impostazione predefinita. Abilita l'evidenziatore dalla pagina delle opzioni dell'estensione

âœ… Cattura screenshot e inseriscilo nelle note

âœ… Temi e caratteri personalizzati
personalizzare l'aspetto di ciascuna nota in base ai suoi scopi

âœ… Ãˆ giunto il momento di dimenticare ctrl+c e ctrl+v
Trascina e rilascia qualsiasi contenuto web, ad esempio immagini, testo selezionato.
domainNote non converte il testo in immagine come fanno gli altri.
domainNote in markdown in modo da poterli modificare facilmente

âœ… Nessun venditore vincolato.
domainNote sincronizza automaticamente le tue note con il file manager locale del desktop in tre formati:
ribasso, html e pdf
Puoi visualizzare e modificare le note in qualsiasi altro editor di note basato su markdown.

âœ… Sincronizza automaticamente le note con altri fornitori di servizi cloud
Puoi sincronizzare le note con i fornitori di unitÃ  cloud: GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox, box. Puoi sincronizzare le note con i fornitori di note cloud: Notion, onenote (disponibile a breve).

âœ… Privato e sicuro
Tutti i dati salvati localmente. Le tue note o file multimediali, ad esempio immagini e video, non toccano mai il nostro server.

Per una guida dettagliata, visitare https://domainnote.noterail.site/guide

long.ko:
ğŸ“¢ Take Website specific notes in side panel with live preview markdown and local disk sync.

ğŸ“Œ Why you should consider this:
âœª live preview markdown
âœª Website specific(Domain-wise) notes
âœª No signup required
âœª Fuzzy search
âœª Text Highlighter (need to enable)
âœª Take screenshot and insert into notes
âœª Dark mode and custom themes.
âœª Sync with desktop local file manager.
âœª Export notes in three format: markdown,html and pdf
âœª Sync with cloud drive: GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox,box,notion.
âœª Pure & clean code that powers fastest performance.
âœª Cloud & Cross-devices sync (coming soon).
âœª All notes and media-files saved locally. Never touch our server
âœª No tracking & no Ads.
âœª Lightweight 50kb only
âœª No third-party library used.
âœª Negligible memory consumption (consume 400% less memory than new tab).

âŒ¨ï¸ keyboard shortcuts
keyboard shortcuts 
Alt + W â‡’ Open domainNote sidePanel
Alt + S â‡’ Capture Screenshot
Ctrl + Shift + S  â‡’ Save edited note
Ctrl+Z â‡’ undo (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+Y â‡’ redo (work only when copy listener on)
Alt + H â‡’ highlight (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl + Shift + H â‡’ remove highlight (work only when copy listener on)
Shift + Space â‡’ extend selection (work only when copy listener on)

ğŸ“Œ == FEATURES ==
âœ… Markdown live preview
You don't need to open separate panel to preview your markdown.
domainNote provides a real live preview like wysiwyg editor.
you can update existing markdown's mark to change formatted text.

âœ… Create Website specific notes
you can group multiple domains

âœ… Remind todo you when you visit website(coming soon)

âœ… Highlight text
Highlight text by right click menu.
Fastest highlighter in chrome web store.
domainNote highlight text without creating new DOM element.
Read more: https://web.dev/dom-size-and-interactivity/

NOTE:Highlighter is disabled by default. Enable highlighter from extension's options page

âœ… Take screenshot and insert into notes

âœ… Custom Themes & fonts
customize each-note appearance according to its purposes

âœ… Time has come to forget ctrl+c and ctrl+v
Drag and drop any web content e.g images,selected text.
domainNote doesn't convert text into image like others do.
domainNote format into markdown so that you can easily modify them
selected text will auto-copied to  domainNote when you press ctrl+c on any webpage
keyboard shortcuts (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+Z â‡’ undo
Ctrl+Y â‡’ redo
Alt+H â‡’ highlight
Ctrl + Shift + H â‡’ remove highlight
Shift + Space â‡’ extend selection

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Take screenshot
Click on screenshot icon for capture and save screenshot
Use Keyboard shortcut (Alt + S)

ğŸ–ï¸ Highlight text
When you clip selected text, selected text will highlighted automatically
Click on Save Highlight button on right bottom corner to save highlight.
For remove highlight, Select again highlighted text and press Ctrl + Shift + H.
For disable highlight, Go to options page

âœ… No vendor locked in.
domainNote auto-sync your notes with desktop local file manager in three format:
markdown,html & pdf
You can view and edit notes in any other markdown based note editor.

âœ… Auto-Sync notes with other cloud providers 
You can sync notes with cloud drive providers:GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox,box. You can sync notes with cloud notes providers:Notion, onenote (coming soon).

âœ… Private and secure 
All data saved locally. Your notes or media file e.g images, videos never touch our server.

For detail guide,please visit https://domainnote.noterail.co/guide

â„¹ï¸ Support 
Join domainNote on google groups: 
https://groups.google.com/g/domainnote

You can mail us: noderailhelp@gmail.com

ğŸ“¢ Maak websitespecifieke notities in het zijpaneel met live preview markdown en realtime synchronisatie op de lokale schijf.

ğŸ“Œ Waarom u dit zou moeten overwegen:
âœª Live preview markdown-editor
âœª Websitespecifieke (domeingewijs) plaknotities
âœª Geen registratie vereist
âœª Fuzzy-zoekopdracht
âœª Persistent Text Highlighter
âœª Maak een screenshot en voeg deze toe aan notities
âœª Donkere modus en aangepaste thema's.
âœª Synchroniseer met lokale bestandsbeheerder op de desktop.
âœª Synchroniseer met clouddrive: GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox, box, notion.
âœª Pure en schone code die de snelste prestaties levert.
âœª Realtime synchronisatie in de cloud en op meerdere apparaten.
âœª Exporteer notities in drie formaten: markdown, html en pdf
âœª Alle notities en mediabestanden worden lokaal opgeslagen. Raak onze server nooit aan
âœª Geen tracking en geen advertenties. âœª Lichtgewicht 80KB alleen
âœª Geen externe bibliotheek gebruikt.
âœª Verwaarloosbaar geheugenverbruik (verbruikt 400% minder geheugen dan nieuw tabblad).

âŒ¨ï¸ sneltoetsen
Alt + W â‡’ Domein openen Notitie zijpaneel
Alt + S â‡’ Schermafbeelding maken
Ctrl + Shift + S â‡’ Bewerkte notitie opslaan
Ctrl + Z â‡’ Ongedaan maken (werkt alleen als luisteraar kopiÃ«ren is ingeschakeld)
Ctrl+Y â‡’ Opnieuw uitvoeren (werkt alleen als luisteraar kopiÃ«ren is ingeschakeld)

Ctrl + Shift + H â‡’ Markering verwijderen (werkt alleen als luisteraar kopiÃ«ren is ingeschakeld)
Shift + Spatie â‡’ Selectie uitbreiden (werkt alleen als luisteraar kopiÃ«ren is ingeschakeld)

ğŸ“Œ == FUNCTIES ==
âœ… Markdown live preview-editor
Je hoeft geen apart paneel te openen om een â€‹â€‹preview van je markdown te bekijken. domainNote biedt een echte live preview zoals de WYSIWYG-editor.
U kunt bestaande markdown-markeringen bijwerken om opgemaakte tekst te wijzigen.

âœ… Maak websitespecifieke plaknotities
U kunt meerdere domeinen groeperen

âœ… Herinner u eraan wanneer u een website bezoekt (binnenkort beschikbaar)

âœ… Blijvende tekstmarker
Markeer tekst via het rechtermuisknopmenu of (Alt + H wanneer de kopieerlistener is ingeschakeld).
Snelste markeerstift in de Chrome Web Store.
domainNote markeert tekst zonder een nieuw DOM-element te maken.
Lees meer: â€‹â€‹https://web.dev/dom-size-and-interactivity/

âœ… Aangepaste thema's en lettertypen
Pas het uiterlijk van elke notitie aan op basis van het doel

âœ… Het is tijd om ctrl+c en ctrl+v te vergeten
Versleep alle webinhoud, bijvoorbeeld afbeeldingen en geselecteerde tekst.
domainNote converteert tekst niet naar een afbeelding zoals anderen dat doen.
domainNote-formaat in markdown zodat u ze eenvoudig kunt wijzigen
geselecteerde tekst wordt automatisch gekopieerd naar domainNote wanneer u op ctrl+c drukt op een webpagina
sneltoetsen (werken alleen als de kopieerlistener is ingeschakeld)
Ctrl+Z â‡’ ongedaan maken
Ctrl+Y â‡’ opnieuw uitvoeren
Alt+H â‡’ markeren
Ctrl + Shift + H â‡’ markering verwijderen
Ctrl+ Shift +Z â‡’ markering ongedaan maken
Ctrl+ Shift +Y â‡’ markering opnieuw uitvoeren
Shift + spatie â‡’ selectie uitbreiden

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Schermafbeelding maken
Klik op het schermafbeeldingpictogram om een â€‹â€‹schermafbeelding vast te leggen en op te slaan
Gebruik sneltoets (Alt + S)

ğŸ–ï¸ Tekst markeren
Wanneer u geselecteerde tekst knipt, wordt de geselecteerde tekst automatisch gemarkeerd
Klik op de knop Markering opslaan in de rechterbenedenhoek om de markering op te slaan.
Om markeringen te verwijderen, selecteert u opnieuw de gemarkeerde tekst en drukt u op Ctrl + Shift + H.
Om markeringen uit te schakelen, gaat u naar de optiespagina

âœ… Geen vendor locked in.
domainNote synchroniseert uw notities realtime met de lokale bestandsbeheerder op uw desktop in drie formaten:
markdown,html en pdf
U kunt notities bekijken en bewerken in elke andere op markdown gebaseerde notitie-editor.

âœ… synchroniseert notities realtime met andere cloudproviders
U kunt notities synchroniseren met clouddriveproviders: GDrive, oneDrive, Dropbox,box. U kunt notities synchroniseren met cloudnoteproviders: Notion, onenote (binnenkort beschikbaar).

âœ… PrivÃ© en veilig
Alle gegevens worden lokaal opgeslagen. Uw notities of mediabestanden, bijvoorbeeld afbeeldingen en video's, raken onze server nooit aan.

Voor een gedetailleerde handleiding, bezoek https://domainnote.noterail.co/guide

â„¹ï¸ Ondersteuning
Word lid van domainNote op Google Groups:
https://groups.google.com/g/domainnote

U kunt ons mailen: noderailhelp@gmail.com
